abstract: The cable company said it sought bankruptcy protection because of the debt it had accrued over years of expansions and acquisitions.
snippet: The cable company said it sought bankruptcy protection because of the debt it had accrued over years of expansions and acquisitions.
lead_paragraph: Charter Communications, the big cable TV company, finally filed for bankruptcy on Friday. But it does not intend to stay there for long.

headline.main: With Deal in Hand, Charter Files for Bankruptcy
headline.print_headline: With Deal in Hand, Charter Files for Bankruptcy

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
